list.title: Question 1
list.markScheme:
We havea+b+c=179.34a+2b+c=188.236a+6b+c=159.8(1)\begin{aligned}

\answer{\begin{array}{rcccccl}
a &+& b &+& c &=& 179.3 \\[3pt]
4a &+& 2b &+& c &=& 188.2 \\[3pt]
36a &+& 6b &+& c &=& 159.8
\end{array}} \qref{(1)}\end{aligned}a4a36a​+++​b2b6b​+++​ccc​===​179.3188.2159.8​​(1)​If we express the system of linear equations(1)(1)(1)as a matrix
equation, we have

![SkillUpp Image](https://assets.revisionvillage.com/public/question/45dabcef-b9ef-4f62-87fe-f37674153ffe/images/3205da83-27aa-4a59-acd7-c2722a0e3a9c/13c88ece23638748c2e63548748180dced5a9e26.svg)

Hence, if we solve the matrix equation(2)(2)(2), we get

![SkillUpp Image](https://assets.revisionvillage.com/public/question/45dabcef-b9ef-4f62-87fe-f37674153ffe/images/918f55b1-39bd-4ecb-8146-97ebf200d357/8c737a936777a47edd03c6c7de7ba744071b76ba.svg)

Hence we finda=−3.2,b=18.5,c=164\answer{a = -3.2, \hspace{0.25em} b = 18.5, \hspace{0.25em} c = 164}a=−3.2,b=18.5,c=164​Evaluatings(t)s(t)s(t)att=0t = 0t=0, we obtains(0)=−3.2(0)2+18.5(0)+164=164m\begin{aligned}
\hspace{6.9em} s(0) &= -3.2(0)^2 + 18.5(0) + 164 \\[6pt]
&\answer{= 164 \text{ m}}\end{aligned}s(0)​=−3.2(0)2+18.5(0)+164=164m​​Solving the equations(t)=0s(t) = 0s(t)=0forttt, we find−3.2t2+18.5t+164=0\begin{aligned}
-3.2t^2 + 18.5t + 164 &= 0 \hspace{10.6em} \\
\end{aligned}−3.2t2+18.5t+164​=0​t≈10.6seconds[by using G.D.C.]\hspace{13.5em} \answer{t \approx 10.6 \text{ seconds}} \hspace{3em} [\text{by using G.D.C.}]t≈10.6seconds​[by using G.D.C.]

list.title: Question 2
list.markScheme:
We havea+b+c=84.34a+2b+c=93.964a+8b+c=42.3(1)\begin{aligned}

\answer{\begin{array}{rcccccl}
a &+& b &+& c &=& 84.3 \\[3pt]
4a &+& 2b &+& c &=& 93.9 \\[3pt]
64a &+& 8b &+& c &=& 42.3
\end{array}} \qref{(1)}\end{aligned}a4a64a​+++​b2b8b​+++​ccc​===​84.393.942.3​​(1)​If we express the system of linear equations(1)(1)(1)as a matrix
equation, we have

![SkillUpp Image](https://assets.revisionvillage.com/public/question/fa6bc1e0-527f-4b17-bf69-2b0fc42d8867/images/865960d0-98ce-4b87-a675-6a46a2ee65ce/b40b58be9e04029307e50815631013b0e434f45c.svg)

Hence, if we solve the matrix equation(2)(2)(2), we get

![SkillUpp Image](https://assets.revisionvillage.com/public/question/fa6bc1e0-527f-4b17-bf69-2b0fc42d8867/images/1b3b62dd-72c9-42d4-8867-f02c938bd983/04caede963f7db2aac1bc0812ea44cf5b6a29875.svg)

Hence we finda=−2.6,b=17.4,c=69.5\answer{a = -2.6, \hspace{0.25em} b = 17.4, \hspace{0.25em} c = 69.5}a=−2.6,b=17.4,c=69.5​Evaluatings(t)s(t)s(t)att=0t = 0t=0, we obtains(0)=−2.6(0)2+17.4(0)+69.5=69.5m\begin{aligned}
\hspace{7.2em} s(0) &= -2.6(0)^2 + 17.4(0) + 69.5 \\[6pt]
&\answer{= 69.5 \text{ m}}\end{aligned}s(0)​=−2.6(0)2+17.4(0)+69.5=69.5m​​Solving the equations(t)=0s(t) = 0s(t)=0forttt, we find−2.6t2+17.4t+69.5=0\begin{aligned}
-2.6t^2 + 17.4t + 69.5 &= 0 \hspace{10.8em} \\
\end{aligned}−2.6t2+17.4t+69.5​=0​t≈9.50seconds[by using G.D.C.]\hspace{13.6em} \answer{t \approx 9.50 \text{ seconds}} \hspace{3em} [\text{by using G.D.C.}]t≈9.50seconds​[by using G.D.C.]
